Open Source Projects

  • 2022
    RcppDeepState
    Contributions
    The R Project for Statistical Computing

    I actively contributed to the RcppDeepState project throughout the Google Summer of code 2022 as a Software Engineer.

    RcppDeepState is an R library to fuzz test compiled code in Rcpp packages. The package extends the DeepState framework to fully support Rcpp based packages. RcppDeepState allows you to fuzz test your R library's C++ code in order to find more subtle bugs like memory leaks or even more general memory errors.

  • 2021
    NASA FPrime Framework
    Contributions
    NASA Jet Propulsion Laboratory

    I contributed to the NASA FPrime flight software and embedded systems framework to improve some of the framework utilities and improve the code quality.

  • 2017
    Data & Analytics Framework
    Contributions
    Italian Developers

    I took part in a hackathon in Trento(Italy) where I developed, with my team, a docker based system to monitor and analyze data for the Italian Developers community, a community of developers who code and design Italian digital public services
